name: Search for entities in data factory

properties.label: Resource
properties.description: Resource type (string with name of the resource)

properties.label: Search variables
properties.description: Map of search variables (has to be map)

properties.label: X-Access-Token
properties.description:
Access token of the user
(${initiator().accessToken or completer('taskDefinitionId').accessToken})

properties.label: Result variable
properties.description: The process variable to put response to (transient)
